name: Angry Bots Audio Demo
description:
Unity Demo from Berklee Online course Game Audio Production with Wwise. All visuals are part of the template game; Unity and Wwise integration/projects provided by Berklee Online.

All sounds and music created by me in Ableton Live, over a period of around 15 weeks. The sounds were made using a combination of personally recorded/foleyed sounds and modified sounds from the Adobe Sound Library and freesounds.org.
